Hello there!
Not sure if this doubt belongs to this channel, but here I go:

Is there any documentation to build an app within HubSpot like the one on the images attached?
The idea here is to open a window in which introducing a store code you can view the store's availability (would be communicated via API)

Thanks!

Hello there,

I want to get private app API call log but there is no option to export as sheet and i can't find any API in HubSpot API docs. So, any one have idea about that.

Thanks!
